about_the_game:
"Evelynn" is an adventure game that tells the story of two little girls, Lynn and Eve, on a travel adventure in an incredible amusement park. With the company and hard work of the two, can they successfully leave this unknown amusement park...

Lynn and Eve met in the paradise, they came here for some unknown reason, faced with everything unfamiliar, they decided to go together. During the journey, they played one ride after another together, met and bid farewell to different people, and experienced one story after another. And this seemingly peaceful and peaceful paradise seems to be vaguely hiding some unsolved mysteries...

game Features

  • Soft and fresh art style, a lot of 2d animation, interaction, character drawing and cg resources.
  • Characters will unlock new costumes as chapters unfold.
  • Rich and interesting collection system.
  • Various puzzles, tasks and mini-games are interspersed among them, and more in-depth puzzles need to be carefully excavated.
  • There will be new characters in each chapter, and there are more than 40 interactive characters in the whole chapter.
  • Different choices or collection completion will affect the ending direction.


    About Us

    Welcome to follow our latest news and make valuable suggestions for the game!
